data.text:
Exciting news üëè our team has achieved a remarkable milestone of launching our ad-supported platform Starz ON in 3 months! We are now ready and fully equipped to become the true platform of choice to all the different segments across the MENA market. A big thank you to the STARZPLAY and evision teams on the amazing execution üôèüëè Our marvelous stars are Faraz Arshad Rida Mourtada Tamer Alfons Abdul Rehman Husain Abid Syed and our content team - you did amazing! üëè

CONGRATULATIONS to the winners of the TiE Women MENA Program 2023 Finals in collaboration with our #e&capital üëè The UAE continues to fuel the startup echo system creating more opportunities to fund women founders. It‚Äôs a great honor to be on the jury next to Majid Al Suwaidi and Malcolm Wall Morris. We were all truly inspired by the incredible talent and the potential of all the women founders pitching their startups and competing for the funding! Congratulations to the winner The Waste Lab , Dubai based impact driven startup, founded by Lara Hussein ŸÑÿßÿ±ÿß ÿ≠ÿ≥ŸäŸÜ , aiming to transform food waste into environmentally friendly solutions and products. Our runner up prize went to PLAYBOOK, a digital platform founded by Wafa Al Obaidat, aiming to bring real life education and inspiring stories supporting women to grow their careers. One of the most well presented and inspiring pitches! I can‚Äôt wait to see those ventures flourish and grow! Thank you Kushal Shah , e& capital and TiEWomen! evision , #e&life , #e& capital , @e& , #venturecapital

From FIFA World Cup to Formula 1, Cricket, and basketball, the MENA region has become a destination for top sports events. The region is bidding heavily on sports, not only to diversify revenue and decrease dependency on oil & gas, but also because it is part of a much bigger vision of the future. Key trends and challenges in recent times, and much more! Looking forward to welcoming everyone at the Future of Sports Broadcasting Summit by #BroadcastPro . #future #strategy #sports #broadcasting

Today, evision by e&, STARZPLAY, and WATCH IT set a new standard in the industry reshaping the media landscape and offering in the market. Two home grown services, STARZplay of UAE and Watch It of Egypt join hands to form a powerful collaboration and a very rich content offering bringing the best in Hollywood and Arabic on one platform. Congratulations to all teams and thank you Nashwa Gad and Amgad Salama for all your support throughout the process. Looking forward to making this collaboration a big success. #content #ott

Pursuing revenue diversification and growing the adjacencies around our core product are key pillars to our transformation journey into a technology conglomerate. At the Nextv Series, we have discussed these different growth engines focusing on Fintech through our e&money, OTT and content distribution through our comprehensive entertainment portfolio led by evision across the MENA region. Thanks to #Dataxis for organizing this. It was a great opportunity to meet our partners and colleagues! #technology #fintech #ott #evision

Today we celebrate the UAE‚Äôs Golden Jubilee Anniversary. A day of honor and pride and a story of advancement and prosperity. I landed in Dubai over 10 years ago and have seen an impressive live example of true leadership and strong vision. The UAE leadership never fails to be many steps ahead of anything we could think of and I can‚Äôt wait to see what the next transformational 50 will bring for us ü§© All the love and respect to my second Home üôè ÿπÿßÿ¥ÿ™ ÿ•ŸÖÿßÿ±ÿßÿ™ŸÜÿß #leadership #dubai #respect #uae #love #uae50

According to new figures from Digital TV Research, and given the unprecented growth the OSN streaming service has seen since its launch back in April 2020, OSN streaming is expected to overtake major players growing to over 3 mil paid subs, and is expected to become the second biggest OTT player in MENA after Netflix. Congrats to a dream team. The amazing team effort has paid off! Bachir Boumediene Tania Ghazzara Imad El Khoury Ahmed Husam Rafeef Rihani Zahi Hachem Nada A. Razek Aly Hassan Burhan Kamal Ralph Dagher Peter Riz https://lnkd.in/dBh-fzEW #digital #gaming #marketing #streaming
